advisory.description: Cristian Fiorentino from Intel reported a vulnerability in Horizon Orchestration dashboard. By tricking a Horizon user into using a malicious template in the Orchestration/Stack section of Horizon, a remote attacker may trigger a cross-site-scripting vulnerability. It may result in potential assets theft (Horizon user/admin access credentials, tenants confidential information, etc.). Only setups exposing the orchestration dashboard in Horizon are affected.
advisory.title: XSS in Horizon orchestration dashboard
